name: LaxOrdnance
description:
2D platformer where In order to escape the Aliens, Gary will need to control his Arm-Cannon's recoil to propel himself in the air.             

This game was developed for the "GameOff-2022" gameJam with the theme ciché, we started from the idea of making a loose cannon and toyed around with the movement and in particular air movement being controlled only through the recoil of said cannon. Along the way we decided to add numerous other video game and pop-culture clichés like the main character being a simple mid-life crises man who suddenly gets thrown out of his reality, and alien abductions and so on.

- Hugo Baptista [Programmer / Unity dev]

- Bernardo Albuquerque [Art / Animation]
